description: Numbers n such that 2047*2^n+1 is prime.
links: E. L. Blanton, Jr., S. P. Hurd and J. S. McCranie, On a digraph defined by squaring modulo n, Fibonacci Quart. 30 (Nov. 1992), 322-333.
author: _Jud McCranie_
extensions: The term 738 was omitted from the reference. 4 more terms Jun 15 1998.
